comments.body: this will make this skipped by default in non-Jenkins runs, too - is this what we want?
I see no reason why Jenkins should be a special snowflake.  Part of the benefit of this effort will be reconciling Jenkins with "real-world" runs.

Same comment as above.  Can we move this out of this test to a utility library.
Happy to defer to a separate PR if you prefer.  Just create a github issue and reference it here.
